text: Therefore, since we have these promises, dear friends, let us cleanse ourselves from everything that could defile the body and the spirit, and thus accomplish holiness out of reverence for God.

<st data-num="5562">Make room</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> in your hearts;<n id="1" /> we have <st data-num="91" class="">wronged</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no one</st>; we have <st data-num="5351" class="">ruined</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no one</st>;<n id="2" /> we have <st data-num="4122" class="">exploited</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st>.<n id="3" />
I do not say this to condemn you, for I told you before that you are in our hearts so that we die together and live together with you.
I have great confidence in you; I take great pride on your behalf. I am filled with encouragement; I am overflowing with joy in the midst of all our suffering.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> when <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">body</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="425" class="">rest</st> <st data-num="3762">at all</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> we were <st data-num="2346" class="">troubled</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every way</st>—<st data-num="3163" class="">struggles</st> <st data-num="1855" class="">from the outside</st>, <st data-num="5401" class="">fears</st> <st data-num="2081" class="">from within</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, who <st data-num="3870" class="">encourages</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5011" class="">downhearted</st>, <st data-num="3870" class="">encouraged</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3952" class="">arrival</st> of <st data-num="5103" class="">Titus</st>.

We were encouraged<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3440" class="">only</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3952" class="">arrival</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3874" class="">encouragement</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3870">gave</st><n id="3" /> him, as he <st data-num="312" class="">reported</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1972" class="">longing</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3602" class="">mourning</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2205">deep concern</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="5620">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoiced</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> than ever.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="3076">made</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3076" class="">sad</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> my <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st>,<n id="2" /> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3338" class="">regret</st> having written it<n id="3" /> (<st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">though</st> I did <st data-num="3338" class="">regret</st> it,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st><n id="5" /> I <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> my <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st> made <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3076" class="">sad</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">though</st> only <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> a short <st data-num="5610" class="">time)</st>.

<st data-num="3568" class="">Now</st> I <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st>, <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you were <st data-num="3076" class="">made sad</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you were <st data-num="3076" class="">made sad</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to the point of</st> <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you were <st data-num="3076" class="">made sad</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> intended,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> you were <st data-num="3367">not</st> <st data-num="2210" class="">harmed</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">any way</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">sadness</st> <st data-num="2596">as intended by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> produces a <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st> that <st data-num="2038" class="">leads</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st>, leaving <st data-num="278">no regret</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">worldly</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">sadness</st> <st data-num="2716">brings about</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">see</st> what <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="846" class="">very thing</st>, this <st data-num="3076" class="">sadness</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> intended, has <st data-num="2716" class="">produced</st> in <st data-num="4771" class="">you:</st> what <st data-num="4710" class="">eagerness</st>, what <st data-num="627" class="">defense</st> of yourselves,<n id="2" /> what <st data-num="24" class="">indignation</st>,<n id="3" /> what <st data-num="5401" class="">alarm</st>, what <st data-num="1972" class="">longing</st>, what <st data-num="2205">deep concern</st>,<n id="4" /> what <st data-num="1557" class="">punishment</st>!<n id="5" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> you have <st data-num="4921" class="">proved</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="53" class="">innocent</st> in this <st data-num="4229" class="">matter</st>.

<st data-num="686">So then</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">though</st> I <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, it was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1752" class="">on account of</st> the one who did <st data-num="91" class="">wrong</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1752" class="">account</st> of the one who was <st data-num="91" class="">wronged</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5319" class="">reveal</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4710" class="">eagerness</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">behalf</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1223 3778">Therefore</st> we have been <st data-num="3870" class="">encouraged</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in addition to</st> our <st data-num="1473" class="">own</st> <st data-num="3874" class="">encouragement</st>, we <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoiced</st> <st data-num="4056">even</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> of <st data-num="5103" class="">Titus</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="373" class="">refreshed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I have <st data-num="2744" class="">boasted</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5100">anything</st> concerning <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, I have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="2617" class="">embarrassed</st> by you,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">just as</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> we <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> was <st data-num="225" class="">true</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2746" class="">boasting</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5103" class="">Titus</st> about you<n id="3" /> has <st data-num="1096" class="">proved</st> <st data-num="225" class="">true</st><st data-num="2532"> as well</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4698" class="">affection</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4056">much greater</st><n id="1" /> when he <st data-num="363" class="">remembers</st> the <st data-num="5218" class="">obedience</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">how</st> you <st data-num="1209" class="">welcomed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5156" class="">trembling</st>.
I rejoice because in everything I am fully confident in you.
